descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/45724-1-1382941385.jpg[/img]

A mod which aims to make hunting a much more profitable, viable and worthwhile experience. The prices of animal parts, and the amount of items each animal drops, have been significantly altered to provide a much more realistic experience.


[b]Pelt Price Changes:[/b] The prices for pelts were pretty unrealistic. Pelts and furs in real life are quite valuable, and this wasn\'t reflected in the game. These new prices give an incentive to hunt, and make hunting actually worth doing.

Bear Pelt: 50 -> 500

Cave Bear Pelt: 60 -> 600

Cow Hide: 10 -> 200

Deer Hide: 10 -> 150

Fox Pelt: 5 -> 75

Goat Hide: 5 -> 50

Horse Hide: 15 -> 150

Ice Wolf Pelt: 15 -> 150

Sabre Cat Pelt: 25 -> 250

Snow Bear Pelt: 75 -> 750

Snow Fox Pelt: 7 -> 130

Snowy Sabre Cat Pelt: 40 -> 400

Werewolf Pelt: 20 -> 2000

Wolf Pelt: 10 -> 100



[b]Animal Part Price Changes:[/b] Again, these were unrealistically low. Although the price changes aren\'t as drastic as the pelt changes, these alterations will increase your hunting experience.

Antlers - Large: 2 -> 40

Antlers - Small: 2 -> 30

Bear Claws: 2 -> 5

Horker Tusk: 15 -> 150

Mammoth Tusk: 150 -> 1500

Mudcrab Chitin: 2 -> 10

Sabre Cat Tooth: 2 -> 15

Slagutherfish Egg: 3 -> 7

Slaughterfish Scales: 3 -> 5

Troll Fat: 15 -> 30 (Weight changed from 1 to 0.5)

Dragon Bones: 500 -> 1500 (Weight dropped) [b]NEW[/b]

Dragon Scales: 250 -> 750 (Weight dropped) [b]NEW[/b]



[b]Animal Meat Price Changes:[/b]

Clam Meat: 1 -> 3

Chicken Breast: 3 -> 4
Grilled Chicken Breast: 4 -> 6

Charred Skeever Meat: 4 -> 3

Dog Meat: 3 -> 4

Leg of Goat: 3 -> 14
Leg of Goat Roast: 4 -> 20

Horker Meat: 3 -> 12
Horker Loaf: 4 -> 16

Horse Meat: 3 -> 8
Horse Haunch: 4 -> 12

Mammoth Snout: 6 -> 30
Mammoth Steak: 8 -> 40

Pheasant Breast: 3 -> 3
Pheasant Roast: 4 -> 5

Raw Beef: 4 -> 8
Cooked Beef: 5-> 12

Raw Rabbit: Leg 2 -> 6
Rabbit Haunch: 3 -> 8

Salmon Meat: 3 -> 4
Salmon Steak: 4 -> 6

Venison: 4 -> 16
Venison Chop: 5 -> 20



[b]Animal Drop Changes[/b]: Most of the animal drops in the game just didn\\\\\\\'t make any sense at all. For example, for every Sabre Cat you kill you would get either 1 eye or 1 tooth, even though every cat has two of each. These changes are to correct such errors. These are the new additional drops:


3 Tusks from every Horker

2 Eyes and 2 Teeth from every Sabre Cat and Snowy Sabre Cat

1-4 Sets of Bear claws from all types of Bear

4 Tusks from each Mammoth

1-3 Cups of Troll Fat from all types of Troll

1-5 Sets of Scales from Slaughterfish

7-10 Toes from each Giant (Weight reduced from 1 to 0.5)

5-10 Feathers from each Hagraven

10-14 Claws from each Hagraven

6-10 Feathers from each Hawk

[b]Meat:[/b]

5 - 8 Pieces of Horker Meat from every Horker

3 - 4 Pieces of beef from every cow

3 - 4 Goat Legs from each Goat

3 - 4 Pieces of venison from every Deer and Elk

3 - 4 Pieces of Horse Meat from each Horse

2 Pieces of Dog Meat from every Dog (because they are ribs)

2 Breasts from each chicken

2 Legs from each Rabbit (only for ones you kill, not hanging ones)



[b]Notes:[/b]

*Items gained from hanging dead animals (pheasants, salmon) are limited to 1 by the CK. Just think that if someone had already killed it then they probbably took some of the meat too!

*Fixed the vanilla bugs relating to the death drops of horses and goats not calculating properly.


If you have any suggestions for this mod, if you think I have missed anything or if you think the new prices are too high/low, tell me in the discussions below.

Also, the armour I am wearing is called the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43649/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D43649%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Hunter Archer Armour[/url] and it can be found on the nexus.
